repository

Class CarRepositoryBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • repository.CarRepositoryBean

  • public class CarRepositoryBean
extends java.lang.Object
    Car repository. Provide methods to add, update, delete, list cars in the repository. The bean is a Singleton EJB. The container can inject the EJB to CDI beans.
